name: Shipping Container Inspection Checklist
External Checks
Check Visual Inspection of Container to ensure no Surface Damage or Holes
Ensure the external surface is clean and no dust/sand
Enure there is no Algae growth in the under carriage
Ensure Container Identification Number is Visible in all sides
Ensure Container Licence Plate is available
Ensure the Doors are locked and sealed
Clean the Container with Compressed air/water before loading
Ensure the Contaner is lashed with the truck after loading
Internal Checks
Ensure Internal Floor/Walls/Ceiling are clean before loading
Ensure no Pinholes visible for water ingress & Seal (if any)
Enure the Timber Floor is intact without any damages
Ensure all the materials are loaded as per Packing list
Ensure the Materials are protected for any damages
Ensure the materials are lashed with internal hooks
Ensure the sea container is locked properly at all sides
Fumigation
Ensure the Modules are Fumigated
Attach Fumigation Certificates (If Any)
TLC - Cleaning & Packing Supervisor/Head Sign-off
Request signoff
Delivery Handover Checklist
Any comments after Visual inspection
TLC - QAQC Sign-off
Request signoff
Shipping Agent Sign-off
Request signoff
Module Packing/Loading Inspection Checklist
Internal Checks
Check the internal of module to ensure the floor, cabinet, furnitures and doors are clean and no residual dust
Check the sliding door to ensure the door is closed and locked. Place the key inside with plastic strap key chain
Check the protection for all items required protection against damage
Check all interior door and main door are in closed condition
Check all loose pack items are lashed inside modules and protected against damage
Check the application of protective membrane wherever required
Check the Installation of Temporaray Exposed Walls
External Checks
Visual checks to ensure there is no obvious damage on wrapping of module
Check that all exterior surfaces of wrapping is clean
Check underneat of Module is cleaned with compressed air and make sure no Dust is present
Check corner blocks make sure are clean with air compressor
Check the fastening straps around modules are tight
Check Polystyrene protection for all items required protection against damage (Windows/Sliding Doors)
Ensure Riser and Stair case openings are fixed with temporary covers
Ensure Hazard Markings and labelling of Access Openings
Final check of shrink wrapping for the touch-up welding
Ensure Module identification Number is Available
Ensure the module is lashed properly on the truck
Ensure the roof truss module/Substructure is lashed and locked properly (if any)
Fumigation
Ensure the Modules are Fumigated
Attach Fumigation Certificates (If Any)
TLC - Cleaning & Packing Supervisor/Head Sign-off
Request signoff
Delivery Handover Checklist
Any comments after Visual inspection
TLC - QAQC Sign-off
Request signoff
Shipping Agent Sign-off
Request signoff
